name: Large-Cap Momentum Breakout with Volume Confirmation
description: Daily momentum breakout strategy that trades liquid large-cap U.S. equities. Enters long when price makes a new 20-day high with volume ≥1.5×20-day average; enters short on new 20-day low with the same volume surge. Positions exit on a close across the 10-day EMA, a 2.5 % fixed trailing stop, or a 5 % take-profit. Each trade risks 1 % of account equity via fixed-fractional sizing.
